document.heading: ARCH Training Center Real Property Tax Exemption and Equitable Real Property Tax Relief Act of 1998

history.narrative: Law 12-195, the “ARCH Training Center Real Property Tax Exemption and Equitable Real Property Tax Relief Act of 1998,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 12-548, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 30, 1998, and September 22, 1998, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 8, 1998, it was assigned Act No. 12-471 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 12-195 became effective on March 26, 1999.
